hivis.interact

Class CalcSeriesP5<V>

  • java.lang.Object
    • hivis.data.DataSetDefault
      • hivis.data.AbstractDataSeries<O>
        • hivis.data.view.AbstractSeriesView<I,O>
          • hivis.data.view.SeriesViewFunction<I,O>
            • hivis.data.view.CalcSeries<V,V>
              • hivis.interact.CalcSeriesP5<V>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DataListener, DataSeries<V>, DataSet, SeriesView<V>, View, Iterable<V>

    public class CalcSeriesP5<V>
extends CalcSeries<V,V>
    Base class for a CalcSeries whose values are affected by the value of a P5 Controller. The series will be #update()d whenever the value for the controllers changes. This class also provides a simplified way of creating calculated series via the apply methods.
    Author:
    O. J. Coleman

      • calc

        public V calc(int index)
        Description copied from class: CalcSeries
        This is the method where you implement the function. Implementations must calculate and return the value that a call to DataSeries.get(int) should return (based on AbstractSeriesView.inputSeries if applicable). The value returned will be cached and returned by calls to CalcSeries.get(int).
        Specified by:
        calc in class CalcSeries<V,V>
